website_summaries.verdict: Small speaker that has quite a bit more bass than you may expect to find, especially at such a low price.
pros: Speaker is available in six different colors
Works wirelessly over Bluetooth or NFC
Speaker's case is suitable to work either indoors or outdoors
Offers up to 16 hours of battery life, which is a high level of performance
Extremely low price for this style of speaker
cons: Bluetooth connection can be a little spotty, which could lead to audio skips and dropped signals

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound in this small package.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my water bottle cage on the bike. Loud enough to hear with not too much traffic or wind. But the best is that it actually sounds very good. Lots of bass for its small size and fun to use in the bathroom, kitchen, and other spaces, too. Recharges quickly and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this speaker!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! Great sound! Perfect size for my Beach bag! I originally bought the JBL clip and returned it because I was NOT pleased! Bought this one and LOVE it! I also use it at home! I am very please and recommend this! Great battery life!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: This speaker isnt great. Connecting to the bluetooth isnt as easy as it should be & the speaker isnt that loud. Wouldn’t recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad connectors!
customer_reviews.text: Faulty connections. Sound pretty good, but what good is that if it keeps losing connection? Jacks are bad.
customer_reviews.author: tedstera

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We started on the wrong foot with this item. First of all, it didn't charge as it was supposed to charge, the 4.5 hours as instructed. It worked ok for the 1st 2 days, then it was a struggle to get any sound from it. Reset it, and it still did not work. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Naysa

customer_reviews.title: or at least provide better customer service in case of any technical issues
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this speaker on March 16 of this year, thinking the Sony brand would be a quality product and worth the higher price for a small bluetooth speaker, or at least provide better customer service in case of any technical issues. Less than two months later, the product will no longer connect to a charger and the battery is dead so it is inoperable and unreturnable :(
customer_reviews.author: The Red Bandana Bakery

customer_reviews.title: One is nice two is amazing
customer_reviews.text: One is nice, two are amazing. Because of the price on Treasure Truck got one. I was pretty happy. Then I read they could be paired to each other for true stereo. So my wife did the Treasure Truck at the next stop and we got two. As a pair, they sound amazing with enough bass to rattle the plates on the patio table. Finally bass and good crisp vocals, The two are smaller than a JBL and about the same as our other wireless speaker. But the patio has never sounded better
customer_reviews.author: Ken in WA

customer_reviews.title: nice sound, when I play music off of my ...
customer_reviews.text: nice sound, when I play music off of my phone. it is not easy to disconnect from the phone, so to receive calls is quite hard to answer when I am using them together.
customer_reviews.author: jimmyjames

customer_reviews.title: This is a great speaker! The only thing I don't like is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great speaker! The only thing I don't like is that the bass on it makes the speaker vibrate, which is distracting. I tried adjusting the bass on my device, which helped. It has great sound for something so small!
customer_reviews.author: J. F.

customer_reviews.title: It's decent sounding little speaker with boast of extended bass ...
customer_reviews.text: It's decent sounding little speaker with boast of extended bass, but the attempt may seems ok for some type of music but definitely not for listing voices/audiobooks. It's okey for small room, bathroom, or similar confined spaces. I tried to listen to it in my car, and even at full volume could barely hear it clearly over road/car noise.
customer_reviews.author: KSISO

customer_reviews.title: Why so many good reviews?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to test this speaker out just because of all the reviews. I wanted something ultra portable that had some good volume to it. I figured maybe this speaker put out some really good sound considering the reviews. The sound quality is ok, expectations were not high. The biggest issue with this speaker is it needs to be at 90% volume just to be at somewhat of a reasonable indoor listening level. I wont have any use for it so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: BWK

customer_reviews.title: DISLIKE!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would of returned this product. It has NOT worked properly from day one. It was working perfectly for the first 2 hours of use. After that the sound went down to about half of its volume. I thought it was just my ears. Unfortunately not the case. It happens every time I use it. The battery life is NO where near what the manufacturer states. Its more like 8 hours. I am extremely disappointed in this product. I would NEVER recommend this product to anyone. Keep looking folks
customer_reviews.author: MelRad

customer_reviews.title: Clearly a used item
customer_reviews.text: Clearly a previously returned item. Had odd flake like brown dirt stuck to it. The base showed light scuffing and wear. If it hadn't been an electronic product I could have overlooked this but I've no way to know how much life it has lost as a result. Speaker was not wrapped in plastic inside the box and no paperwork. Always a sign it's a return. When I buy something new.. I expect new. I didnt bother to plug it in and play it.. just returned.
customer_reviews.author: James G. Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds really good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wireless speaker for a gift and she LOVES it!!! It is very nice quality, compact, portable and I personally have never gone wrong with Sony. The price was really good too. My husband gave me a wireless speaker that leaves a lot to be desired and it cost double. This little Sony sounds way better. I guess he is not as good a shopper as me LOL Anyhow, if you want a really nice wireless speaker this is perfect. Unfortunately I will have to wait until the one my husband gave me "kicks the bucket" until I can have an excuse to buy one for myself :P
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Its not loud for most applications, and they dont cover return shipping costs!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is not loud enough for most occasions. This most certaily wont work for a party, a kitchen, or other lightly social intractive places where you need music. Nor-can it really make great noise. Ontop of buying a sony speaker that is just not loud for what I need, I do believe that the buyer (me) has to pay to return this, which Is quite annyoing when most amazon products, returns are covered. Allwell! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew w

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker, nice sound quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker a lot when hubby and I want to view a YouTube video together on a tablet or phone. I also use it for listening to podcasts while doing chores. It has a ring attached, which makes it easy to carry around. It is sturdy, and has a non-slippery cover, which prevents dropping it. After I bought it I realized it's waterproof so that it can be used in the shower. I have no interest in that feature, but the protective case is still of value to me. My phone, tablet, and laptop are all paired to it, and I have given it the name "cute little red speaker" -- because it is!
customer_reviews.author: red riding hood

customer_reviews.title: Nice and even better if paired
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, small and portable and really works well and sounds nice when you have two speakers. Speakers can be set up to connect together, left and right. I recommend doing that. Small but fills the room with two. Speakers have volume button but not skip. You can use your phone for that though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Price

customer_reviews.title: Nice with limitations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little speaker to attach to an Echo Dot for the guest bedroom. The material is nice, and the build quality is great. The battery life isn't bad, but it isnt great either, it has varied, maybe we got a bad unit, but given that it is plugged in most of the time, it hasn't turned into an issue. The sound DOES distort at high volumes, but at 3/4 of the volume it is loud enough and the sound is excellent for such a little speaker. This is perfect for a guest room, college dorm room, etc. It is definitely not meant for large spaces, but overall, for the price it is a good quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Quality speaker, quality components?
customer_reviews.text: The Sony xb10 is a quality speaker, it sounds good for it’s size and it’s super portable. Sounds like a winning combination right? Well maybe, I could not keep a good Bluetooth connection for music. It continually cut out every few seconds even with the phone just 5 feet away. Could this be an isolated issue? Sure, but I had to return mine because it was unbearable to listen to.
customer_reviews.author: Jshirls1921

customer_reviews.title: Solid little speaker.  Bass boost feature is a little bit annoying.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is loud enough, has battery life, good range, and it sounds pretty good. I found that if I sat it down flat on a hard surface the bass became really boomy and overpowered the rest of the spectrum. If I hang it or mount it away from a surface, it sounds much better. All in all, it's a really good bluetooth speaker for the money. I used it for 8 hours a day at medium to high volumes and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: handy: Update~! ordered 2 and both went out within month
customer_reviews.text: The charge lasted 12 hours and I just recharged it so it would not go out. I have iPod and this plays my audiobooks and music louder. I even put it in my car so I could listen to books well. It is small enough for travel, wish the case was not a separate purchase, that would make it a 4.5, an indicator to let you know how much battery life is left would be a 5. A good buy. Update: It went out and stopped functioning after a month, this happened with 2
customer_reviews.author: lissa k

customer_reviews.title: Small Compact full of lots clear sound and bass!!
customer_reviews.text: The little mini boom box!!! Plays for hours on end delivering bass and a clear sound in a small package. I'm really impressed ! Well done Sony! Has a connection tone when the Bluetooth is connected from a phone or tablet. I recommend getting two of them for a nice mini stereo. Cons: Connecting two of these speakers for a stereo sound. Instructions to troubleshoot and connect aren't very good and it took me a while to connect both of them. Once the two speakers are connected, one of these will be the main connection (I have a sticker to mark it) and now both of them are in sync.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Extra bass is unnecessary, but it's a good quality speaker.
customer_reviews.text: A generally good speaker, the main draw for me was its long battery life compared to other Bluetooth speakers. It performs well, although there isn't a way to turn off the "extra bass" effect as far as I know. That's not how the artist/mixer intended the song to be heard; if you want more bass, use an equalizer. Not a huge problem for me though, since I mainly use it for audiobooks.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I think if you're going to play quiet music this solution could work.  If you're looking to rock out, you can probably do better
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great and it's a handsome little speaker, but get more than 5 feet away from source and the Blue tooth loses connection and the sound quality goes to crap. Also, mine broke within 2 weeks so I got a refund. Maybe I was playing the volume too loud? I think if you're going to play quiet music this solution could work. If you're looking to rock out, you can probably do better.
customer_reviews.author: James Bond

customer_reviews.title: Small, but really cool speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool Bluetooth speaker. The bass is really loud and we can carry it wherever--at picnics, parties, or even inside the car. We have a Pre-K child who loves listening to music and this makes the music crisp and loud enough for our apartment. Just a tip for lazy folks like me who want to pair this with different devices, you'll need to hold the power button for about 5 seconds or so as you're pairing it with your device.
customer_reviews.author: penstalker

customer_reviews.title: Speaker stopped working-
customer_reviews.text: We've been loyal to Sony for many years and have always been happy with the many Sony products we've owned. I bought this with the same expectations, but unfortunately Sony let us down. This thing lasted 7 months and stopped charging. It was never abused, dropped, or exposed to water. It was always in the house. I am not happy I am left with a relatively new Sony product that is dead and totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of Sony products and have trusted their quality for quite some time. This has not let me down. While easily portable, the durability and sturdiness of this speaker is a real plus not to mention the superb sound quality. I have been thinking about buying a second one to pair with this one but the room filling sound of one may be enough. The XB10 is user friendly and pairs quickly with every device I have tried. I listen to a lot of classical music, which in some cases, is very long playing and, so far, I have found the battery life to be as advertised. Highly recommend the XB10.
customer_reviews.author: carol yess

customer_reviews.title: The best speaker on the market
customer_reviews.text: Its cute, handy, and made well. The sound is wonderful. So much stero sound from and small speaker. And dont get me started on the bass, its wonderful. When you here it you look around for a large stereo. Also very portable. And Amazon sells a case that goes with it. Which Im going to purchase. On top of it all, it was super easy to hook up to my phone. And dont forget this is water proof. So very nice for pool parties and family outings. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: High quality wireless speaker that I use for yoga classes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take with me when I teach yoga classes. It is linked to my phone and my spotify account so all I have to do it get on spotify and 'find' the speaker. It works great, turns on high volume for a large room and has great quality sound. I do not have to worry about getting a speaker for my playlist lined up. This speaker is very small and light weight. It came with a little caribiner clip so I can just attach it to my yoga mat bag.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H Olsen

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive,colorful, portable wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker to listen to recorded books. It was easy to set up and 'pair' with my Tablet. The distance it will broadcast is not long--maybe 15 feet if there is a little interference such as a corner. A wall will completely stop play. The color of my speaker is neon-bright (makes it easy to find). The quality of the sound is adequate for the spoken word and the distance/volume the speaker broadcasts is more than adequate for a large room. I think an audiophile would find it inadequate for a situation requiring very high quality sound. For example, it broadcasts upwards only--not around in a circle
customer_reviews.author: slyders

customer_reviews.title: Good design, performance is acceptable but not so good as the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two speakers and put beside my bed, and I used them before sleeping. I like the design which can support two bluetooth speaker, it makes really like stereo. Plus, it is tiny and easy to carry with, I can use it when I riding the bicycles. The only issue I found is: The sound effect is not so good as I expect, the L/R mode seems doesn't work so well. And, I don't see any smart setup such as App to use. Sometimes the one of two speakers loses connections, I am still checking if it is the issue of my phone or the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, good price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Sony Bluetooth speaker after ordering a cheap, no name brand speaker with poor sound quality and no ability to hold a charge. This Sony Speaker is a breath of fresh air. The controls included on the unit are: power on/off, volume up and down, play, and pause. The speaker also acts as a speaker phone which is perfect for the way I intend to use it. The material on the outside of the speaker is soft and it feels well made. I'm currently charging the speaker and use it. I'll update with comments about battery life.
customer_reviews.author: SkyeBlue

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! (Updated!) Updated again 5/22
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this speaker. You'd figure with the Sony name it would be of utmost quality. I'm not playing it loud by any means and it constantly skips out. Very annoying. I will be contacting the seller bc this is ridiculous! Update! I realized I've had this for almost a month and never charged the battery. Gave it a full charge and it's like new again. Sorry for jumping the gun. So, the fully charged theory is a wash. It still skips. Very annoying and I'm very disappointed. Come on Sony!
customer_reviews.author: SamInMass

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing bass, Good form factor
customer_reviews.text: I thought this thing was going to have great bass based on the descriptions. But the bass on this unit is what you'd expect from a 5 inch tall speaker. Marginal at best. Buy this for the waterproof capability and the battery life, but if you're looking for bass, I'd skip out on this one. Pros: really cool and convenient carrying strap. great form factor, sound is marginal, great battery life, waterproof Cons: doesn't connect automatically like my other speakers, marginal bass sound,
customer_reviews.author: Eric V

customer_reviews.title: What a find!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and gave one to a friend. I love it that it is so portable. I throw it in my backpack for travel and use it in my hotel rooms for music. It has great sound and works everywhere as I have it paired to my phone. It is also easy to pair it to any other device. I bought it for a trip to the beach as it is water proof and I found I had confidence it keeping it next to me on the sand. No problems. The price is right too, very reasonable. I would recommend this item to anyone who travels either abroad or just away for a weekend. What a find!
customer_reviews.author: Judi w.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this speaker. I bought it because my son had one and I kept using it while he was out. I tried a few slightly less expensive portable speakers but always ended up disgusted because they didn't sound right. I love the base, I love the red color, love the water resistance. Instead of drowning the whole house in music when I clean, I can just move my speaker from room to room or outside when I go out with the baby to play and the sound quality is always great. I'm not listening thinking ' this would be better if it was on the big system'. I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and Google Assistant is not built in.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound for its size. I does distort at higher volumes and is not very loud for noisy environments. The description said it supports Google Assistant, but what it means is the microphone on the speaker will let you talk on your phone, so you can give commands to your phone. I got mine used but the value should be around $20. I was tempted to return it but since my daughter don't use the jbl link we traded, because she liked the compactness of the Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Megatron Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this speaker. After I bought one for myself, I bought one for my wife, and advised two friends to buy one for themselves. We're all happy with this purchase. The volume it can sustain and the bass response are quite impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect speaker for the palm of your hand
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, it's not as loud as the JBL Clip 2, but has a lot more bass than the JBL Clip 2, as far as this price range and small size, it's in a class of it's own!
customer_reviews.author: Damien Beckham

customer_reviews.title: I Am Stunned!!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are ridiculous. For how small/portable they are, it's pretty loud. The sound covers a whole bedroom with the volume halve way up. Sound quality is pretty good, mids/lows are "boom-y". 16-hour battery life is incredible as well. These bluetooth speakers have so many plus's!! For a $30 Cyber Monday special, these are forsure a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, especially in stereo mode
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one of these (blue) and was pretty impressed with its performance as a small single speaker. It was loud, full of bass, and very clear. The water resistance served as a cool party trick and was generally a nice, but not necessary feature. A few weeks later I bought a second one in black, in order to get stereo sound. The pairing was simple, and the sound got even better. There now room filling volume, and the stereo channel seperation is great when listening to music. Overall these speakers are great value, stylish, and most importantly, they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Rana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for strollers!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the stroller for my morning walks with my son. I have had it for 5 months now and I love it. We go for 30-40 minute walks 4-5 times a week. I charge it once a month! It hasn’t dies on me yet. The battery life is awesome and the main reason I got it. The sound is nice, but not booming enough for a backyard party. Perfect for my needs though. In the picture, it’s the little gray thing in the left cup holder. Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ldianea

customer_reviews.title: Very saticfied.
customer_reviews.text: I am very saticfied with this purchase. The soun is much better than another speaker I had for twice the money. I purchased the second one and use them to listen to Amazon Prime Music at work. Co-workers comment on the quality of the sound, as well as the price. The batter life is amazing too. They last longer than the iPad battery.
customer_reviews.author: leroykidd

customer_reviews.title: Rugged feeling portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: They sound pretty good for such little speakers. They are about half the size of a 12 oz soda can but slightly larger in diameter. The can be paired together to give a stero sound Left and Right. But only 2 can be connected together. The SRS XB-10 doesn’t support party chaining. They look and feel very durable if you want to use them as truly portable speakers. They feel like they may hold up to a little abuse. If you want small speakers to be used in a permanent place or can be cautiously move. I recommend the Harman Kardon onyx mini they sound better for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is by far perhaps in my opinion 1 of the best well designed and built mini speaker within price range. Sound and volume quality outstanding which makes it IDEAL for listening to Music. I had to replace b/c oops my fault drops and it affected sound quality. Could not find to replace. I bought a diff Sony model within price range - simply did not match up.😲 Again, my opinion if your usage is for listening to audio speaking talks etc... - JBL-clip version w/in same price range is Awesome 😎
customer_reviews.author: DRaW

customer_reviews.title: Small speaker, big sound!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas. He loves it, infact the whole family loves it. The sound is great, sound like its coming out of a big speaker, its so small you can take it anywhere and it sounds great. My only regret is that I did not buy 2 of them because you can link together for stereo sound. I am definitely going to get more of these.
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Great lil speaker
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lil bluetooth, sounds better then expected. With its tiny size I was expecting something alot less, now don't get me wrong something this tiny can't put out much bass at all but for its tiny size it really puts out alot of clear highs lows and even manages to make a decent sounding bass. Fits the portable good speaker need, very happy with it, going to get another to pair with it now that I know its well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker. It is super powerful for its size. You can't throw a party with it but you can have a nice sounding speaker with decent bass in your apartment or by the pool, whatever. I bought my mom and myself one each and we hook them up to make a surround sound experience. Tis lovely. The only downside is it loses connection by bluetooth if you take your phone around a wall. But it works for my uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good Speaker
customer_reviews.text: My old speaker died after 3 years and I needed to get a new one. This speaker is much smaller than my old one, about the size of a coffee cup. It is well built with rubber coating. It has 6 buttons on it that are flush against the side of the speaker. . The sound quality is pretty good and it has a nice bass to it, however, the sound is not as loud as one may hope. Battery life is good and I get about 11-12 hours at full volume. It has an audio port on the side and a charging port covered by a rubber door. Overall I am happy with it and will keep this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Pirumyan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & good quality overall
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend who loves music. He is one who does a lot of labor work around a shop and is not the most careful person with delicate objects; like he goes through cell phones all the time careful. It has lasted him for over a year. The sound quality is not bad either and can get very loud for such a small object. I guess that also means very portable and easy to carry around with not a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Fernstrom

customer_reviews.title: Small but very nice sound
customer_reviews.text: What a nice little speaker this is! It charges pretty fast, and seems to hold a charge for quite a long time (for me). While this doesn't provide studio quality sound - keep in mind this is just a little Bluetooth speaker. I've heard other Bluetooth speakers and I would put the sound quality of this little guy up with more expensive models. Plus, it's footprint is pretty small - I just love this little speaker! I would definitely recommend this little guy!
customer_reviews.author: 3athlt

customer_reviews.title: Lacks the Bass it claims to have...
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound quality of these, but the bass is lacking.. Tried eq'uing in my phone and tablet settings, but it didn't help much.. The build, the pairing, stereo quality are all good.. If you need something small just to listen to music.. This will definitely do.. Two are even better. But just don't believe the Extra Bass hype on the box.. If you want Bass.. Jump up to the XB31, or the 41.. Those two are "Beasts" and they sound great...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: It's like I'm hearing all my music for the first time. I didn't realize all the bass was cut-out before. Now you can hear the bass guitar etc... It stays connected too. I had problems with other speakers in the past, as far as connectivity goes. My only complaint is amazon didn't put any packing paper in the box. So the speaker was bouncing around in the box they put it in, on it's way here. But luckily it works fine. The manual says not to subject it to mechanical shock. So Amazon fails in that regard. Very happy with the Sony product though. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Unbearable lag
customer_reviews.text: Horrible lag. Impossible to watch videos or play games. Sony's site tries to blame wi-fi interference and microwaves. Sony says its raining.....lol im sending these back buyer beware. The headphones I got from them suck too.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a minute.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in August. It was great. Good sound quality. Easy to set up and use. Stopped working just under 6 months. Pretty disappointed that it didn't even make it a year.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, portable, and great sound!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Just got this delivered today on same day delivery for a trip tomorrow and have already tested it out. I am really impressed with the sound quality and can't wait to use it this weekend! It is small and portable but the quality doesn't suffer. I can't speak to the battery life yet but it says 11 hours, not bad! I would def buy again based on what I've seen so far!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: The base is good for the size of the driver but it will ...
customer_reviews.text: At first when I got this I was expecting a larger unit. But Since I have had this now for a few months I can't imagine my backpack without it. I have used it on hike, business travel, even as a backup speaker for a trade show class. Holds a charge well, and sounds clean and load for it's size. The base is good for the size of the driver but it will distort at full volume (as expected)
customer_reviews.author: Phillip L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very good little speakers
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these speakers set as stereo speakers for an Echo Dot. We had one and when a larger system quit working, we got another. They produce a very nice sound, were easy to pair with the dot and with each other, and when paired and plugged in do not have an auto sleep.
customer_reviews.author: LRR

customer_reviews.title: Great travel party speaker
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale. It is awesome for the price, ease of use, powerful, good battery life, and small. I just came back from Costa Rica with this. We party with this sucker 4 nights in a row in a Jaco Penthouse with big open area. This was enough to get the party going. Everyone was impressed with the little thing. For the size, it is convenient and works well. Can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: NumberSix

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound for the Size
customer_reviews.text: Just had to write a short review because I rarely do but this product deserved one. This is by far the best small portable wireless speaker I own for this price range. I own a few in this price range but this Sony speaker sound quality for it's size was amazing. I was so impressed with it. It seriously rivals some higher quality speakers I own plus it's water resistant and durable. Definitely worth a consideration if you're in the market.
customer_reviews.author: spudster

customer_reviews.title: Won't Stay Connected to Phone
customer_reviews.text: My phone has no other issues with any other device, but this speaker will not stay connected for more than a few seconds. I have reset the speaker, reset bluetooth etc, but nothing seems to work. Even cleared the cache on the phone. What a waste. It did sound good for the first couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Xnuiem

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from the treasure truck and I am very happy with it. The sound is good, bass is better than expected, and great battery life! Could be louder for outdoor spaces, but pretty good there. I love the cord attachment that doubles as a stand for the speaker! Also, the product description says its water resistant - let me tell you, I accidentally left this out in the rain and forgot all about it until morning. We had a fairly strong storm, too. Went out the next morning and found it, speaker side up, with water pooled. After letting it dry for a while, I powered it up and it worked like a champ!!! Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Metaljess77

customer_reviews.title: I cant believe sound like this comes out of this small speaker
customer_reviews.text: From look of the speaker it's hard to tell that I would be loud enough to even fill a room; but just playing one song and you'll know what it's capable of. I play a lot of heavy bass music and the speaker can literally be heard any where in the house it has a rich and full sound. Definitely good as a portable party speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Akshar

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: It performs as well as my Bose and cost less than half as much. The sound is everything I had hoped it would be. This is the only product I have ever awarded 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Wrong Way Bill

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Pairing the to my phone was at first not easy until I discovered that you pair one and the other will pair itself with the first one. Once I got them paired, they are a sheer delight. Amazing sound, much longer battery life than I expected, and they are easy to haul around. I bought two and the stereo works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Danwood

customer_reviews.title: Pure junk
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to use this speaker for nearly two months. I have several othter speakers I use with my Bluetooth so I know my phone works fine. But this speaker needs umpteen attempts to connect and sometimes just refuses to connect. I quit buying Sony TV's because of problems. Now I see their speakers don't work well either. :(
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I received a pair of these speakers as a gift. Since then I have purchased them for all the members of my family. The sound is good and I move them from room to room so that the music travels with me. I am not an audiophile. They just provide good entertainment when I work around the house.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Quality portable bluetooth speakers
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with these speakers. The quality is worthy of the Sony name. The setup for two stereo speakers is straightfoward. It's fun to put them in different places around the home including near the shower. They are so much easier to manage than wired speakers and they sound better than laptop or phone speakers. The bass and treble are separated on them and the sound fills a room easily. My only wish is that they had wireless charging or longer battery life (I have to recharge them every few days).
customer_reviews.author: erratum

customer_reviews.title: Music On The Go
customer_reviews.text: Best Portable Bluetooth Speaker EVER Sony Did A Outstanding Job With This Did Not Know How Huge The Sound Quality Is Extra Bass Range With Good Battery Life 16 Hours That's Amazing,I Would Buy A One More For The Both Speakers Stereo Sound Good Job Sony!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Davien Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good, if you can hear it.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is pretty good for the price, but don't attempt to turn it up. This speaker will not get very loud. I'm hard of hearing, so this was pretty disappointing. I was hoping to be able to turn it up a bit, but it barely turns up at all, so if you don't like whispers, this most likely won't be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kat In Florida

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME SPEAKER!!👍👍😉
customer_reviews.text: ALL I can say is OMG!! For a small speaker it kicks butt! The bass is awsome!! If anybody knows Sony, for their mega bass! I would get a couple to really get the affect!! I would recommend this product.i LUV mine.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Carr

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Back in 2016 i had ordered the Sony SRX11 Ultra Portable that had lasted me until November 2018. I used it all the time and loved it until I ordered the Sony XB10 Portable Wireless Speaker. Although its fairly new the sound is better, a little bit bigger, but small enough to bring with me everywhere. I am very happy, and feel that this device was a much better choice for the extra money that I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Beans

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Its about the diameter of a Coke can but puts out a reasonable amount of low end. I am a dj and listen to mostly electronic music so the amount of low end was important to me and this definitely does the job (for the money). A family member has the Bose Soundlink II (so I used it a lot) and this is 70% of what that speaker offers but for 1/4 of the cost. I wasn't comparing max volume or anything though, only casual listening of dance music.
customer_reviews.author: Krista h.

customer_reviews.title: Has great sound
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth speaker is perfect for me and meets all my expectations. First off, it has a great sound, crisp and clear with bass undertones. I love the size and the nifty loop for easy carrying. It took me a while to figure out how to pair the speaker with my laptop, but now it is totally routine and is super easy and just takes a few seconds to do. I'm not sure about battery life yet, since I just purchased this item about a month ago. I highly recommend this bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Ps 91

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good speaker
customer_reviews.text: I got this speaker for $29.99 on the amazon truck which is an amazing deal. This speaker has great bass. I just don't like how the sound isn't surrounded. You hear it clearly just from the top. I recommend ue boom in bluetooth speakers. I like how the speaker wraps all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connectivity is not that great.
customer_reviews.text: The speakers sound OK. Too much bass in my opinion but this is a matter of taste. However the bluetooth reception really sucks. I never had this problem with the jam plus that I had before. If the speakers are too far apart and are paired. One will go silent for a few seconds every so often. Not cool. I'd like to return but it's too late, so I'll try to get a refund using my Amex Return protection.
customer_reviews.author: T. popescu

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Small, great sound. Charged it, paired it, and played it. Simple. Sounded great, cranked it up and way too loud for indoor. Just what I wanted for Beach House Vacation coming up. No apparent distortion at high volume. Not sure if I will ever get a second one but the Stereo option sounds like it should be really good if I ever do decide on going with that option.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K.

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker for a library
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely a little disappointed in the volume of the speaker I was definitely expecting more. As far as the battery life goes it’s awesome the 16 hr play time is awesome. It can keep playing without missing a beat even when getting sprayed with a hose. The main reason for the less than excellent review is just simply the fact that it’s just not very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Miner

customer_reviews.title: Bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure which speaker to buy and researched many. I decided to pay a little more and get a brand that I knew had a good reputation. I use this for my office, about a 14x9 foot room. The speaker is loud enough (I have it hanging from the ceiling behind my desk) and the sound is amazing. I love music with bass and this speaker delivers. Now I'm sure it will not compete with a Bose speaker, but at this price, you just can't beat it. We have a few different wireless speakers at home and I think this one ranks right up there.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product from Sony
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the bluetooth devices I've purchased, the Sony XB10 Portable Wireless Speaker seems to be one that will last the test of time and use. Great sound, quality material, and the Sony brand behind it makes it a great purchase if you ever need a wireless speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Ithea

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth speaker I ever used
customer_reviews.text: The quality of sound from this speaker is much more than what I expected from its size. The bass is very rich yet not overwhelming. The voice sound is very clean and pleasant to listen to. The battery life is very good so far. The paring with my iPhone X is almost instant. You do not have to push and hold to turn it on and off. The soft grip is really nice to hold and carry it around in the house and outside too.
customer_reviews.author: tmphotosan

customer_reviews.title: NOT VERY GOOD SOUND QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a sony girl forever. I have an older Bluetooth speaker that I absolutely love but I wanted something a big smaller with just as much power and sound quality as my old one. This speaker is super small and the sound quality is very disappointing. Obviously the product being much smaller will have some sort of effect on the sound but I definitely was not enjoying my music at all that I just shut it off. ☹ I really did like the design and how portable it is. I would guess that this is probably ok to take to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Raphi

customer_reviews.title: Great to take along anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker! I like to listen to podcasts as I do chores, and I don't always want to wear earbuds. I use this speaker in the kitchen when I meal prep and then move it with me around the house as I do other things. It's also great for travel. It pairs easily with my iPhone and has a good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Sony Wireless Speaker goes with my SUB...
customer_reviews.text: I love this Sony Wireless Speacker.. I am On my SUB Stand Up Board out in the middle of the lake listening to a my favorite songs.. Even though it is water proof I put in my water proof back pack and hands free .. The best little Sony Wireless Speaker ever .Going to order another for duel sound at home.Thanks Sony ...
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is a powerhouse. I recharge it every once in a while when I remember, and it has never died on me. Excellent sound. It's not bose but honestly, it's not far off. I am actually considering buying a couple more because some how they are connectable and that would be awesome for our outdoor get togethers. Especially since there is a clip so you can hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Polk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Such a small device for a big, clear, sound! I love the finger holder to carry it! It charges well, and easy to use with my phone! I use it almost daily! It's great for company out on the patio! They have no idea where its coming from, since the device is so small!
customer_reviews.author: lfollon

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very nice for the price. Bought for our teenager to use in her room and to take to the locker room with her. It is durable, water resistant, and has a nice sound for the size of are that she uses it in. The price being reasonable helps to be able to transport it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: For this not to be a Bose brand speaker, this little and lightweight speaker is used all over my apartment. It’s perfect for the shower room, traveling to the pool, or anywhere for that matter. I use it everyday at minimum for 2-3 hours. I charge it maybe every 2 weeks at that usage rate. I was a fortunate consumer that caught this on the Amazon Treasure Truck. This speaker does exactly what it is described to do! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Quality! But too expensive for the volume
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to grab this speaker at a deal but disappointed at the volume level. I was thinking that at such a high price for a small speaker from a popular brand like Sony would mean that the speaker would be loud. At a similar price you could get much louder speakers from less known brands here on amazon. That being said the quality is good and speaker does feel practically invincible.
customer_reviews.author: ripl123

customer_reviews.title: I’m disappointed in the overall performance of these 2 speakers
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed in the overall performance of these 2 speakers.. one rattles if volume is increased.. other one ok..I have purchased many Sony products over the years and these speakers do not compare to the quality of previous purchases
customer_reviews.author: Philip gentry

customer_reviews.title: Small, powerful and aesthetical.
customer_reviews.text: I am highly satisfied with this speaker. It has flawless sound up to 90% of the volume. At 100%, the quality drops a bit but the speaker still does not produce jarring noises as other speakers of its size do. It works perfectly for me as a shower speaker in a small bathroom where we don't need that much volume. The bass is extraordinary for its size. I also like the bold SONY emblem on the speaker. Looks decorative to my bathroom next to the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really holds a charge, perfect in golf cup holder
customer_reviews.text: got this summer 18, gave it a good charging and put it in my bag, its never gone dead on the course, I only charge it after 3 or 4 rounds over a three of 4 week period. sounds good and loud
customer_reviews.author: sir golfalot

customer_reviews.title: SMALL SIZE, BIG SOUND!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this small size speaker with a big sound. It is perfect for listening to music from my iPhone late at night, not bothering anyone unless I choose to turn up the speaker. Then it can be heard in other rooms. Its size in the carrying case is small eno9ugh to fit in a purse. I gave it the highest rating because the sound is clearer without static and has an awesome bass that is clear and strong.
customer_reviews.author: V. R.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for college grandson
customer_reviews.text: Grandson specified this portable speaker as the one he wanted for Christmas 2019. Loves the size. Happy using it when he rides his bike up in the Redwood area, as he doesn't like using earbuds while on a trail.
customer_reviews.author: C L Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and portable.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect speaker for on the go and outdoor activities. I keep in my golf bag for music while at the course. Speaker fits in cup holder on the cart. Battery life keeps in running for 18 holes. Sound is good and loud enough to hear even when not right over top of the speaker. Several golf buddies have asked where I got it because it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: wow sound
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs some serious volume. Great Bass. I mean, I was seriously impressed. It's on par with my bose soundlink and it's half the size. I love riding on my bike with it. And it's a great soundtrack in the shower. Definitely, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: AMACam

customer_reviews.title: Don’t play at full volume with heavy base music
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these speakers to pair them to play on the outside deck. The sound quality is good, however I’m getting a bit of distortion with music that has heavy bass and now a slight vibration in the speaker. I’d recommend not to play music too loud (for a loud party for example) as the speakers may blow. Other than that, they’re sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Huggster

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speaker a while ago, and the battery life is still the same as when it was brand new, great speaker, nice sound for such a small speaker, crystal clear, when mine goes bad I will definitely search for a Sony brand speaker again.
customer_reviews.author: Canada

customer_reviews.title: This speaker puts out a powerful sound!
customer_reviews.text: This was given to my daughter as a gift. She loves the sound and it is synced with her phone and IPad to listen to her music. It’s easy to set up and use and blue is her favorite color, so blue I bought her. It comes in several colors.
customer_reviews.author: Joann P

customer_reviews.title: Two months of use kills the deal.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until today. Received April 7 2019 - great sound... even ordered one for my parents on April 12 I liked it so much. Today, mine won't take a charge. 5 or 6 times charging it up and it's done. It didn't fall while charging or get stuff in the port... it's just done. Hope my parents have better luck with the other one.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

product_meta.title: Sony SRSXB10/BLUE XB10 Portable Wireless Speaker with Bluetooth, Blue, med
product_meta.description: Color:BlueGet things booming anywhere with this portable Bluetooth speaker with extra bass and a compact, water-resistant design for worry-free listening indoors or out. Connect two together for real stereo sound and listen all day with up to 16 hours of a battery life. It’s ready to pick up and play.
feature_bullets: Feel the power of EXTRA BASS
Connect and stream music easily with Bluetooth and NFC
Add an extra speaker for stereo sound
Water-resistant design for worry-free listening indoors or out
Listen all day with up 16 hours of battery life
Pick it up and play with the small, lightweight design

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,275 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #1,926 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#14,517 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
